invitations.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation for {{email}}?
invitations.confirmDecline: Are you sure you want to decline this invitation?
invitations.emailHint: You can invite multiple people at once. Separate email addresses with commas or new lines.
invitations.emailMismatchInstructions: Please log out and sign in with the invited email address to accept or decline this invitation.
invitations.emailMismatchStrict: This invitation was sent to {{invitedEmail}}, but you're logged in as {{currentEmail}}. You cannot accept this invitation.
invitations.emailPlaceholder: Enter email addresses separated by commas or new lines
invitations.expiredMessage: This invitation has expired. Please contact the tour organizer for a new invitation.
invitations.noEmails: Please enter at least one email address
invitations.noValidEmails: No valid email addresses found. Please check your input.
invitations.tooManyEmails: Cannot invite more than {{max}} people at once

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Invitation
confirmDialog.description: Please review the email addresses before sending invitations.
confirmDialog.duplicatesNote: Duplicates have been removed and will only be sent once.
confirmDialog.summary: Ready to send invitations to {{count}} recipient(s). {{hasIssues}}
confirmDialog.withIssues: Some emails were excluded due to errors.
confirmDialog.noValidEmails: No valid emails to send. Please fix the issues above.

onboarding.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

step1.description: Create trip proposals by clicking the "Add Trip" button. Add details like dates, descriptions, and links to accommodations or activities.
step1.title: Create Trip Proposals

step2.description: Invite friends and family via email. They'll receive an invitation link to join your tour and participate in the planning process.
step2.title: Invite Participants

step3.description: Vote on your favorite trips, leave comments, and discuss with other participants. Once everyone has voted, the tour owner can lock voting and finalize the trip.
step3.title: Vote and Discuss

participants.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this tour? You can be re-invited later.
participants.leaveSuccess: You have successfully left the tour
participants.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this tour?
participants.removeSuccess: {{name}} has been removed from the tour
participants.title: Participants

tourList.archivedToursInfo: Tours are automatically archived after their end date.
